mcbj.HoldTrace.fit_line_to_psd¶

HoldTrace.fit_line_to_psd(freq: ndarray, psd: ndarray, fit_range: Tuple[float, float])¶

Fit a line to a single PSD and return the line parameters

Parameters:
freqnp.ndarray

frequency

psdnp.ndarray

calculated PSD

fit_rangeTuple[float, float]

frequency range to fit line

Returns:
poptnp.ndarray

the slope and the intercept of the fitted line

perrnp.ndarray

standard deviation error of the slope and the intercept

MCBJ STM-BJ
